arts.ttl: England international a concrete option for Tottenham but Daniel Levy unlikely to pay release clause
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur would appear to be in the box seat for the signature of an England international, though Daniel Levy isn’t likely to pay his full release clause. Protests against the Lilywhites chairman have ramped up in recent weeks, though there’s no sign of him stepping down from his position anytime soon. Ange on if it was Sonny, Deki's and Djed's turn to be rested...

arts.ttl: Tottenham confirmed team vs Man City - Son, Kulusevski and Spence on the bench, Odobert starts - football.london
arts.sum: The Australian rested Pedro Porro and James Maddison for that match and both return, while Destiny Udogie and Brennan Johnson, who scored twice at Portman Road, continue but captain Son Heung-min, Dejan Kulusevski and Djed Spence all take their turn on the bench. Here's the Spurs team Postecoglou has selected to face Manchester City at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.

arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur transfer update: Ange Postecoglou could lose star in summer window as European giants linked
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur could face the prospect of losing one of their stars to a European giant, with suggestions that the club are not ambitious enough to keep him.

arts.ttl: Pep: 'Old Man City' won't be back this season
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola has admitted fans will never see "the old Manchester City" again this season but vowed they will be back to their best after beating Tottenham Hotspur 1-0 on Wednesday.
I thought we dominated the whole second half, played in their half, created chances, but obviously missing the goal and disappointed to lose.” We were just missing that final action at times.”

arts.ttl: Haaland returns with winning goal as Man City beat Spurs
arts.sum: Haaland saw a late second disallowed for handball following a VAR check that confirmed the referee’s on-field decision, while Pape Sarr missed a glaring chance to level when he headed over in the 98th minute. But Pep Guardiola's side produced a dominant first-half performance in north London, which was rewarded when Haaland tapped home on his return from injury for his 20th Premier League goal of the season.

arts.ttl: Premier League forced to release Erling Haaland VAR statement during Tottenham vs Man City
arts.sum: " #TOTMCI – 90+4’ The referee’s call of no goal for a handball by Haaland was checked and confirmed by VAR – with no conclusive evidence to overturn the on-field decision," it read. Erling Haaland gave Pep Guardiola's side the lead after just 12 minutes at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and though Spurs pushed for an equaliser, they were unable to find one.

arts.ttl: Dominic Solanke drops huge Tottenham injury return hint before Man City clash
arts.sum: Dominic Solanke has hinted he is close to returning from injury as Tottenham prepare for a huge Premier League clash against Manchester City. Watch the Premier League on TNT Sports
